You can store, use and swap cryptocurrencies between different blockchains like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Litecoin (LTC), Tezos (XTZ) as well as tokens USDT (ERC20 token), tzBTC (Tezos wrapped Bitcoin), TBTC, WBTC (Ethereum wrapped Bitcoin) without intermediaries from your mobile wallet.\r\n\r\nWhat makes Atomex wallet special?\r\nAtomex Hybrid exchange combines advantages of centralized and decentralized exchanges:\r\n‚Ä¢ You're in control: Private keys are kept encrypted on your mobile wallet. Cross-blockchain transactions are carried out using Atomic Swaps.\r\n‚Ä¢ No additional fees: You pay only a miner fee for both regular and cross-blockchain atomic swap transactions.\r\n‚Ä¢ Stay incognito: No registration or identity verification required because Atomex is a non-custodial cryptocurrency wallet.\r\n‚Ä¢ Audited: All blockchain atomic swap smart-contracts and crypto wallet core library audited by LeastAuthority.\r\n‚Ä¢ Staking Tezos: Delegate your Tezos (XTZ) to trusted bakers from the Baking Bad list and bring an income.\r\nWhat is Atomic Swap exchange?\r\nAtomic swap is a technology for secure exchange of digital assets without the need to trust a third party. It‚Äôs as secure as cryptographic primitives and blockchain implementation it's based on. It's mathematically proved that in every scenario you either succeed with an exchange or get your money back. Atomex uses an on-chain implementation based on hashed timelock smart-contracts.\r\n\r\nHow long does an atomic swap take?\r\nDepending on the chosen pair of cryptocurrency, the exchange may take from several minutes to an hour. The maximum time is 6 hours, after which the coins are returned to your crypto wallet.\r\n\r\nHow are private keys stored?\r\nYour private keys are stored ONLY on your mobile wallet device, encrypted using AES-256. You have to unlock your crypto wallet with the encryption password on every start.\r\n\r\nStaking Tezos\r\nStake Tezos (XTZ) from your own wallet with a delegation function. It brings passive income automatically. Delegation in Tezos is absolutely safe. Your coins are not locked or frozen and do not move anywhere. You can spend them at any time and without any delay from your Atomex wallet. Just keep in mind, you only delegate your rights, that‚Äôs it. Atomex wallet uses Tezos Baking Bad baker‚Äôs list. So you can be sure you stake your Tezos (XTZ) with trusted bakers.\r\n\r\nHD crypto wallet\r\nHD (Hierarchical Deterministic) Crypto Wallet ‚Äî is a standard for generating a hierarchical tree-like structure of private/public addresses (keys), so that you can create as many wallets as you like and restore all of them from a single seed phrase.\r\n\r\nOpen-source\r\nAtomex is an open-source project by the Baking Bad team, which is known in the Tezos community as one of the most active ecosystem contributors.\r\n\r\nYou can leave a feedback or ask us any question via email: support@atomex.me","descriptionHTML":"Atomex ‚Äî is a non-custodial crypto wallet with a built in Atomic swap decentralized exchange (DEX). It‚Äôs as secure as cryptographic primitives and blockchain implementation it&#39;s based on. It&#39;s mathematically proved that in every scenario you either succeed with an exchange or get your money back. Atomex uses an on-chain implementation based on hashed timelock smart-contracts.<br><br><h2><b>How long does an atomic swap take?</b></h2><br>Depending on the chosen pair of cryptocurrency, the exchange may take from several minutes to an hour. The maximum time is 6 hours, after which the coins are returned to your crypto wallet.<br><br><h2><b>How are private keys stored?</b></h2><br>Your private keys are stored ONLY on your mobile wallet device, encrypted using AES-256. You have to unlock your crypto wallet with the encryption password on every start.<br><br><h2><b>Staking Tezos</b></h2><br>Stake Tezos (XTZ) from your own wallet with a delegation function. As of now, one can invest only in Bitcoin via Bitdroplet, but the list grows soon.\r\n\r\nThe underlying principle of Bitdroplet is Dollar-cost Averaging ‚Äî an investment strategy in which an investor purchases small amounts of an asset at different price points to mitigate the impact of price volatility. Usually, in the long term, Dollar-cost Averaging reduces the average purchase price of the asset compared to its current market price. In comparison with Fixed Deposits, Recurring Deposits, Mutual Funds, SIPs, and other investment vehicles, long term investment in Bitcoin has been much more profitable in the past decade, which makes Bitdroplet a necessity.\r\n\r\nThrough Bitdroplet, the minimum amount a user can invest is 5 USDT. The amount they invest is channeled via their Bitbns wallet, where the minimum deposit limit is 15 USDT using P2P USDT Transfer. If the user already has USDT in their Bitbns wallet, they can directly invest the USDT they hold.\r\n\r\nUsing Bitdroplet is easy. You just need to:\r\n\r\nLogin to your Bitdroplet account.\r\n\r\nScroll down and click ‚ÄòStart an investment in Bitcoin‚Äô\r\n\r\nFill the form and click ‚ÄòNext‚Äô\r\n\r\nAdd a goal and click ‚ÄòNext‚Äô\r\n\r\nClick ‚ÄòConfirm Goal‚Äô\r\n\r\nClick ‚ÄòDeposit Money‚Äô\r\n\r\nNext step is depositing money. For that go to ‚ÄòWallet‚Äô and click ‚ÄòDeposit Money‚Äô. Bitdroplet wallet holds your investment only in the form of USDT. The minimum amount you can transfer from Bitbns to Bitdroplet Wallet is 0.01 USDT.\r\n\r\nDeposit USDT\r\n\r\nClick ‚ÄòDeposit Money‚Äô. Now you will find three ways of depositing money to your Bitdroplet wallet. Choose any one.\r\n\r\nBuy USDT with FIAT ‚Äî Use this method if you do not h\r\nhave USDT funds. In this method, you will have to first buy USDT on Bitbns and then transfer it to your Bitdroplet wallet. This is how it works:\r\n\r\nGo to Wallets > Choose P2P USDT Transfer.\r\n\r\nYou will then be taken to your Bitbns account. Users in countries other than India can use only USDT P2P transfer if they want to purchase USDT with their FIAT currency.\r\n\r\nNext, enter the amount of USDT you want to deposit.\r\n\r\nClick ‚ÄòNext‚Äô to proceed to peer-matching window.\r\n\r\nClick ‚ÄòSend Amount‚Äô and transfer the deposit amount to the peer using their bank account details.\r\n\r\nEnter the Transaction Reference Number and click ‚ÄòDone‚Äô.\r\n\r\nOnce you have USDT in your Bitbns wallet, go back to Bitdroplet and select ‚ÄòTransfer from Bitbns‚Äô.\r\n\r\n2. Transfer from Bitbns ‚Äî Use this method if you already have USDT funds in your Bitbns wallet. For transferring USDT from Bitbns wallet to Bitdroplet wallet, go to ‚ÄòWallets‚Äô and select ‚ÄòTransfer from Bitbns‚Äô. In case you don‚Äôt have USDT but have other cryptocurrencies, you can sell them to get FIAT, with which you can buy USDT. Then, you can use ‚ÄòTransfer from Bitbns‚Äô the same way.\r\n\r\n3. Deposit USDT ‚Äî Use this method if you have USDT funds in some other exchange. Go to ‚ÄòWallet‚Äô, click ‚ÄòDeposit Money‚Äô and select ‚ÄòDeposit USDT‚Äô. You would then be able to see a QR code as well as your Bitdroplet wallet address. Use this address to transfer USDT from some other exchange to Bitdroplet.\r\n\r\nBitdroplet does not represent just our belief in Bitcoin; we did a thorough research in Bitcoin and drew the obvious conclusion that Bitcoin is by far the most profitable asset in the history of mankind. Check out our Research Report.\r\n\r\nWith Bitdroplet, we aim to inculcate the habit of saving in people, no matter where they hail from. Store and send funds, or buy gift cards from over 90 major brands. **U.S. Only\r\n\r\nWith the BitPay Wallet, you control your private keys and money and you're using code that's 100% open source for community testing and audits.\r\nThe following features are built into this version of the BitPay app:\r\n\r\n- Real time gift card purchasing from major brands including Amazon.com\r\n- Support for Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum and XRP\r\n- Support for ERC-20 stablecoin tokensincluding USD Coin (USDC), Paxos Standard (PAX), \r\nGemini Dollar (GUSD) and Binance USD (BUSD)\r\n- Multiple wallet creation and management in-app (including SegWit)\r\n- Ability to buy bitcoin & other cryptocurrencies\r\n- Intuitive multisignature security for personal or shared wallets\r\n- Device-based security: all private keys are stored locally, not in the cloud\r\n- Hierarchical deterministic (HD) address generation and wallet backups\r\n- Payment protocol (BIP70-BIP73) support: easily-identifiable payment requests and verifiably secure payments\r\n- Support for 150+ currency pricing options and unit denomination in BTC or bits\r\n- Email and push notifications for payments and transfers\r\n- Easy spending proposal flow for shared wallets and group payments\r\n- Support for testnet wallets\r\n- Customizable wallets name and order\r\n- Multiple supported languages, including French, German, Chinese (Simplified), and Spanish\r\n\r\nThe BitPay  app is free and open source software. It includes an aggregator of news and articles, a crypto market monitoring feature, and a portfolio manager. Users also have the opportunity to choose the main screen of the application: News or CoinMarketCap.\r\n\r\nThe application is well optimized: it takes not much space on the disk and CPU, and it also consumes little battery power.\r\n\r\nNews\r\n\r\nCrypto News collects publications from various news sources such as Cointelegraph, Bitcoin.com, CoinDesk, Forklog, Twitter, etc. There are more than 100 websites in the list of sources and it is constantly updated with new ones.\r\n\r\nInformation is provided in English, Russian, German and Spanish languages. The news is systematized in the ‚ÄúCategories‚Äù. Also, ‚ÄúTop news‚Äù tab contains the most relevant and popular ones. Users can customize the feed and receive information only from certain sources. Each news has an audience interest index. Users will not miss news and events ‚Äî the push notifications will remind of the most important ones.\r\n\r\nIf the news seems interesting, but there is no time to read it, you can add bookmark it and return later or find it via the title search function. If you think that the news from a single source is not full enough, the app groups materials on this topic in one list, so you can get the alternative or more detailed version of the story.\r\n\r\nCoinMarketCap: feel the market pulse \r\n\r\nThe CoinMarketCap tab is integrated into the app, so you can be aware of cryptocurrency prices in a real-time mode. There are changes for 1 hour, 24 hours or 7 days; You can choose from a linear or ‚Äúcandle‚Äù display of the chart.\r\n\r\nThe application collects the data about more than 1000 cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Ripple (XRP), Litecoin (LTC), Dash, NEO, IOTA (MIOTA), Monero (XMR), NEM (XEM), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Lisk (LSK), Qtum, EOS, Zcash (ZEC), Cardano (ADA), Tether (USDT), Stellar Lumens (XLM), etc. The search function can always help you in finding the needed coin, by name or by the ticker symbol. It is also possible to pin all the important coins at the top of the list.\r\n\r\nUsers can always check the price of a coin on a particular exchange, including Binance, EXMO, Huobi, Kucoin, OKEx and others. It is also possible to track the volume of cryptocurrency trading on the exchanges you are interested in. Crypto News app can notify you about the changes in the coin price, its capitalization, changes of the BTC market share ‚Äî all you have to do is set the ranges of changes.\r\n\r\nPortfolio management\r\n\r\nThe main function of this feature is to control and monitor the value of various crypto assets. Users can enter the number of coins and indicate the purchase price ‚Äî the application will calculate their current value and profitability.\r\n\r\nThe application displays both the total balance and the value of each asset separately. It represents profitability for the selected period in percent and real equivalent. You can choose to display portfolio value from the list of fiat currencies. The service does not require personal data, keys and passwords for performance. You can specify any coin balance ‚Äî it is not necessary to match your real account.\r\n\r\nPRO version\r\nWhat are the benefits of the paid version of Crypto News?\r\nno advertisements,\r\noffline mode for reading news (if there is no internet connection),\r\nunlimited notifications,\r\nunlimited coins in the portfolio,\r\nentering the portfolio by fingerprint, password or FaceID (for iOs).\r\nYou can try all these options for free during a 7-day trial period.\r\n\r\nManage your portfolio, follow the news of the market and the cryptocurrency industry 24/7 with Crypto News!\r\n\r\nAbout us:\r\nWebsite: https://cryptonews.net\r\nPrivacy Policy: https://cryptonews.net/privacy-policy\r\nTerms of use: https://cryptonews.net/disclaimer","descriptionHTML":"Crypto News is a useful application for crypto enthusiasts. Users will not miss news and events ‚Äî the push notifications will remind of the most important ones.<br><br>If the news seems interesting, but there is no time to read it, you can add bookmark it and return later or find it via the title search function. If you think that the news from a single source is not full enough, the app groups materials on this topic in one list, so you can get the alternative or more detailed version of the story.<br><br>CoinMarketCap: feel the market pulse <br><br>The CoinMarketCap tab is integrated into the app, so you can be aware of cryptocurrency prices in a real-time mode. There are changes for 1 hour, 24 hours or 7 days; You can choose from a linear or ‚Äúcandle‚Äù display of the chart.<br><br>The application collects the data about more than 1000 cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Ripple (XRP), Litecoin (LTC), Dash, NEO, IOTA (MIOTA), Monero (XMR), NEM (XEM), Ethereum Classic (ETC), Lisk (LSK), Qtum, EOS, Zcash (ZEC), Cardano (ADA), Tether (USDT), Stellar Lumens (XLM), etc. The search function can always help you in finding the needed coin, by name or by the ticker symbol. It is also possible to track the volume of cryptocurrency trading on the exchanges you are interested in. Users can enter the number of coins and indicate the purchase price ‚Äî the application will calculate their current value and profitability.<br><br>The application displays both the total balance and the value of each asset separately. It represents profitability for the selected period in percent and real equivalent. You can choose to display portfolio value from the list of fiat currencies. The service does not require personal data, keys and passwords for performance. –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–æ–∂–µ–Ω–∏–π –∏ –∫–æ–º–∏—Å—Å–∏–π —Å —Ä—ã–Ω–æ—á–Ω—ã–º–∏ - –≤—Å–µ –º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –Ω–∞–π—Ç–∏ –≤ –æ—Ç–∫—Ä—ã—Ç–æ–º –¥–æ—Å—Ç—É–ø–µ. –ú—ã –≤—Å–µ–≥–¥–∞ –≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–∏–º –ø—Ä–∞–≤–¥—É, –≤–µ–¥—å —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ —Ç–∞–∫ –º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–∏—Ç—å –¥–æ–ª–≥–æ—Å—Ä–æ—á–Ω—ã–µ –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω—ã–µ –æ—Ç–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å –∫–ª–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞–º–∏.\r\n\r\n–°–µ—Ä–≤–∏—Å—ã\r\n\r\n–ö–æ—à–µ–ª–µ–∫ –û–Ω–ª–∞–π–Ω ‚Äî –≤–∞—Å.\r\n\r\n–ö–æ—à–µ–ª–µ–∫ –ë–ª–æ–∫—á–µ–π–Ω ‚Äî –ú—ã –≤—ã–¥–∞–¥–∏–º –≤–∞–º –∫–ª—é—á–∏ –∏–ª–∏ —Ñ–∞–π–ª, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –º–æ–∂–Ω–æ –ø–µ—Ä–µ–Ω–µ—Å—Ç–∏ –≤ –∞–ø–ø–∞—Ä–∞—Ç–Ω—ã–π –∫–æ—à–µ–ª–µ–∫. –í—Å–µ –∫–ª—é—á–∏ –æ—Å—Ç–∞—é—Ç—Å—è —Ç–æ–ª—å–∫–æ –Ω–∞ –≤–∞—à–µ–º —É—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–µ. –¢—Ä–∞–Ω–∑–∞–∫—Ü–∏–∏ –ø–æ–¥–ø–∏—Å—ã–≤–∞—é—Ç—Å—è –∞–≤—Ç–æ–º–∞—Ç–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏.\r\n\r\n–ö–æ—à–µ–ª–µ–∫ –û—Ñ—Ñ–ª–∞–π–Ω ‚Äî
